list.historyEntry: I'm getting the following error while building my project. The error is: 'R' is not a valid file-based resource name character: File-based resource names must contain only lowercase a-z, 0-9, or underscore ``` $ ./gradlew :app:packageDebugResources 'R' is not a valid file-based resource name character: File-based resource names must contain only lowercase a-z, 0-9, or underscore ``` How do I fix this?
what are the different menu entries ?
